data.text: Babilonia nsubɔntene ho, ɛhɔ na yɛtena suiɛ
ɛhɔ na yɛn nnommumfafoɔ bisaa yɛn nnwom,
Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛatumi ato Awurade nnwom
Ao Yerusalem, sɛ mewerɛ firi wo a
Sɛ mankae wo sɛ mʼanigyedeɛ kɛseɛ pa ara a,
Ao Awurade, kae deɛ Edomfoɔ yɛeɛ
Ao Babilonia babaa a wɔahyɛ sɛ wɔbɛsɛe wo,
Nhyira nka deɛ ɔkyekyee wo nkokoaa
